# [Interview #196: DragonCon Report - Isabel, Entry #33](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=196#33)

#### Ted Herman

Was Taim a sparker or a learner?

#### Robert Jordan

I am sorry?

#### Ted Herman

Did Taim have the spark or could he learn how to channel?

#### Robert Jordan

He was born with the spark.
